Response from Geisha 06/03/2024
Thank you very much dear Yvesü•∞
By Chapakan the 05/02/2024
2 weeks ago I met Geisha in Geneva and what can I say. Atypical, tall, unusual for a native Asian, sensual shapes and she knows how to be physically expressive. But above all, her attitude is just wonderful, perfect, and it thrills all your senses. Everything happens naturally, without haste or taboos, because with her, sex becomes an art, a subtle game. I loved everything about her, the reality is only better. I would have liked to keep her for myself, so please be respectful, enjoy this unique experience. She's rarely on Ge, your patience will be rewarded in the most beautiful way.
